abilities.name: Heavy Weight
abilities.details: Terros is permanently [bf]immune[/] to all slow effects.[n]However, all of his bonus movement speed is converted into bonus [ar]physical resistance[/] instead.

abilities.name: Quake Slam
abilities.details: Terros slams his twin maces in 2 straight lines, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to all enemies hit and briefly [db]slowing[/] them.[n]In Earth Dragon form, Terros slams his massive claws in a wide cone, dealing increased [ad]physical damage[/] and [db]stunning[/] the enemies instead.

abilities.name: Lithic Aegis
abilities.details: Terros hardens his scales into a dense crystalline shell, gaining a [sh]shield[/] that absorbs incoming damage for a duration.[n]While the shield is active, Terros stores a percentage of the damage he takes (maximum limit based on his [ar]physical resistance[/]). When the shield is destroyed or expires, it shatters, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) plus the damage stored during the absorption phase.[n]In Earth Dragon form, the [bf]shield strength[/] and [bf]absorption limit[/] are increased.

abilities.name: Challenging Roar
abilities.details: Terros releases a powerful roar that [db]taunts[/] a single target enemy for a short duration, forcing them to attack him.[n]In Earth Dragon form, the roar is replaced with a tremor in a circle around Terros, taunting all nearby enemies instead.

abilities.name: Tectonic Breaker
abilities.details: Terros transforms into the Earth Dragon, gaining increased [bf]size[/], [bf]attack range[/] and [ar]physical resistance[/].[n]Upon activation, Terros releases a massive seismic shockwave, dealing [ad]physical damage[/] (scaling with [ar]physical resistance[/]) to all enemies hit and slightly [db]knocking[/] them towards himself.[n]While in Earth Dragon form, his abilities are enhanced.
